statements: DELETE FROM transportation_data WHERE route_id = 100 AND avg_speed > 50;
DELETE FROM transportation_data WHERE id = 101 AND vehicle_type = 'Car';
DELETE FROM transportation_data WHERE route_id = 205 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM transportation_passengers WHERE passenger_name = 'John' AND age = 25;
DELETE FROM traffic_analysis WHERE traffic_count < 1000 AND location = 'City Center';
DELETE FROM Infrastructure_Planning WHERE population < 50000 AND infrastructure_type = 'road';
DELETE FROM Development_Projects WHERE location = 'City A' AND budget > 1000000;
